achievements.name: My Heart Lies With the Stars
achievements.desc: Launch a journey into the vast Galaxy\n<color=#8790abff>※ Congratulations! You've boarded the Astral Express!</color>

achievements.name: Everwinter Night
achievements.desc: After enduring the snow storm...\n<color=#8790abff>※ You have arrived at the city named Belobog</color>

achievements.name: Lost World
achievements.desc: Discover the secret beneath Jarilo-VI\n<color=#8790abff>※ There are people living underground...</color>

achievements.name: Half the Wizard of Oz
achievements.desc: Defeat the tin man and the little girl\n<color=#8790abff>※ Svarog and Clara became your friends!</color>

achievements.name: Winter Is Leaving
achievements.desc: Let's change Belobog, starting with me!\n<color=#8790abff>※ Step One: Defeat Supreme Guardian Cocolia...</color>

achievements.name: Sauntering Fox
achievements.desc: Diplomacy is but a trade of opinions...\n<color=#8790abff>※ Confer with the leader(s) of the Xianzhou Luofu</color>

achievements.name: Omniscia Spares None
achievements.desc: What goes around comes around. No rogue shall escape capture.\n<color=#8790abff>※ Successfully capture the Stellaron Hunter Kafka</color>

achievements.name: A Professional Onlooker
achievements.desc: When the wind-watcher watches you...\n<color=#8790abff>※ Find Qingque, who is "working hard" at playing games...</color>

achievements.name: Prophets Do Not Prophesize
achievements.desc: Witness the mystery of the Divination Commission's matrix\n<color=#8790abff>※ Interrogate Kafka with the Matrix of Prescience, and challenge the divination with this foresight...</color>

achievements.name: The Deer Hunter
achievements.desc: The furnace undoused, the deer silenced\n<color=#8790abff>※ Save the Artisanship Commission from the crisis</color>

achievements.name: Slayer of a Very "Deer" Friend
achievements.desc: Try to walk on the Path of The Hunt...\n<color=#8790abff>※ Help Xianzhou to defeat the Abomination of Abundance, "Ebon Deer"</color>

achievements.name: Svah Sanishyu
achievements.desc: If they come back to life, then just kill them again...\n<color=#8790abff>※ Defeat the Master of the Disciples of Sanctus Medicus</color>

achievements.name: The Imbibitor Lunae Arrives
achievements.desc: Sea's Depths Conceal No Stone, Dragon's Breaths Reveal the Moon.\n<color=#8790abff>※ Witness Dan Heng part the waters in Scalegorge Waterscape</color>

achievements.name: The Arbor Snaps
achievements.desc: All plots shall be overturned\n<color=#8790abff>※ Help Jing Yuan to defeat Phantylia</color>

achievements.desc: Defeat an enemy when a character has less than 1% of HP left

achievements.name: All Men Must Die

achievements.name: Passing as a Flower in the City of the Dead

achievements.name: Serial Breaker

achievements.name: Always Come Prepared

achievements.name: Highway Star

achievements.name: Extreme Survival
achievements.desc: Win a battle with all four allies having HP percentages equal to or less than 0%

achievements.name: Bullet Time

achievements.name: Perish Song
achievements.desc: Get knocked out together with the enemy

achievements.name: Bring a Gun to a Knife Fight
achievements.desc: Deal #2[i] DMG or higher to an enemy whose HP percentage is equal to or lower than <unbreak>0%</unbreak> in a single action

achievements.name: Deus Ex Machina
achievements.desc: Inflict Weakness Break on enemies 3 time(s) using the Trailblazer (Destruction) in a single battle

achievements.name: Four-and-a-Half Pirouettes
achievements.desc: Trigger Herta's talent with an ally's single action, and have her twirl 5 time(s)

achievements.name: Surge of Tiles
achievements.desc: Qingque starts her turn in the "Hidden Hand" state for 3 turn(s) in a row

achievements.name: It's My Turn

achievements.name: The Thirteen Labors
achievements.desc: In a single battle, make Svarog block attacks toward Clara 13 times

achievements.name: Coffee Lover
achievements.desc: A cup of coffee thrice a day, keeps the foggy head at bay\n<color=#8790abff>※ In a single battle, use Himeko's Ultimate 3 times</color>

achievements.name: Over-Protective
achievements.desc: Win 1 battle(s) without having Gepard's Shields take any DMG
